text:
MacBooks are up to 25% off for Black Friday: Save on Air, Pro, and accessories Black Friday is the best time of year to buy a MacBook. These are the best sales of 2025 on models with M4 and M5 chips.

The best Black Friday phone deals: Score free devices from Verizon, T-Mobile, and more The best Black Friday phone deals can get you a new iPhone for free. These are the best current offers from Verizon, AT&T, and more.

Mint Mobile review: The top budget carrier for long-term value Mint Mobile offers some of the most cost-effective phone plans in the long run, with four data tiers starting at just $15/month.

The best 43-inch TVs of 2025 A 43-inch TV is a good fit for small rooms, and some models work great as gaming monitors.

The best OLED TVs for crisp, high-contrast picture quality The best OLED TVs deliver deeper black levels and wider viewing angles than LED and QLED models. Here are our top picks from LG and Samsung.

Best HP coupon and promo codes we've tested in November 2025 These HP coupon codes can help you save up to thousands of dollars on your next purchase when you apply them at checkout.

The best 48- and 50-inch TVs of 2025 Our experts have picked the best 50-inch TVs for bedrooms and smaller spaces, including recommendations for gamers and casual viewers.

Coursera Plus early Black Friday deal: Save 40% on your first year of online courses Coursera's early Black Friday deal is one of the best ones we've seen from the platform all year. Here's how to save 40% on a year of online learning.

The 5 best 55-inch TVs of 2025 Our guide to the best 55-inch TVs includes expert recommendations for casual viewers and enthusiasts across budgets and brands.

The best 85-inch and 83-inch TVs of 2025 Extra-large 85-inch TVs are ideal for viewers seeking an immersive experience. We've selected the top models from brands like TCL and LG.

The best Bose soundbars of 2025 The best Bose soundbars include a compact model for small spaces, a midrange option with Dolby Atmos, and a large model with powerful performance.

The best Roku TVs of 2025 Roku's smart TVs feature the brand's intuitive interface built in. The company's best displays also offer good image quality for the money.

Best Skillshare coupon and promo codes we've tested in November 2025 Skillshare is one of our favorite online learning platforms in 2025. Save 30% on a subscription with the best Skillshare discount codes.

The 6 best headphones of 2025, tested and reviewed Our picks for the best headphones include over-ear, noise-canceling, and earbud-style models from Bose, Sony, Apple, Soundcore, and Sennheiser.

The best 75-inch and 77-inch TVs of 2025 A 75-inch TV is ideal for anyone seeking an extra-large screen for an immersive viewing experience. Our picks include sets from Samsung, TCL, and LG.

The 4 best soundbars for upgrading your TV speakers Our reviewers have selected the best soundbars for all needs, ranging from powerful Dolby Atmos systems to entry-level models.

The best art frame TVs of 2025: How do Samsung, Hisense, and TCL models compare? With matte screens, flush mounts, and swappable bezels, art frame TVs are designed to blend in like a piece of framed art hanging on your wall.

The best smart TVs of 2025, tested by experts The best smart TVs offer voice search, speedy interfaces, and lots of streaming apps. Here are our top picks across each major operating system.

The best record players and turntables for beginners and enthusiasts Our audio expert has selected the best record players for different budgets, including high-end options and entry-level models with Bluetooth.

Amazon is selling the new Apple Watch Ultra 3 for almost $100 off, its lowest price yet The Apple Watch Ultra 3 is the newest smartwatch in the tech giant's lineup, and it's on sale at Amazon for the first time ever.

Best Visible phone plan deals for November 2025: Save up to $312 over 2 years The best deals on Visible phone plans offer Verizon speeds and reliability without the high cost. Here are the best ones you can score now.

The best 4K TVs of 2025: Top models reviewed by experts The best 4K TVs strike a balance between performance, price, and smart features. Our recommendations include models from Samsung, LG, TCL, and Roku.

The best Samsung TVs in 2025 Samsung produces a wide range of excellent TVs for various users. Here are our top recommendations, from bright 4K QLEDs to high-contrast OLEDs.

The best AirPods alternatives of 2025 Apple's AirPods are popular earbuds, but several excellent alternatives offer similar features and unique benefits.

The 5 best 65-inch TVs of 2025 Many TV brands use 65 inches as the premier size for their flagship models. This size offers a big-screen experience but still fits in most rooms.

The best 100-inch TVs of 2025 for a theater-like experience at home TVs in the 98- to 100-inch class are perfect for viewers who want to enjoy movies, sports, and video games on a massive screen.

Best Mint Mobile deals for November 2025: Home internet discounts Mint Mobile offers affordable cell service and now, internet service, without the confusing contracts. Here are the best offers available now.

Best cheap VPN deals on apps we've extensively tested - prices from $1.99 This guide to the best VPN deals only includes services I've extensively tested ourselves for digital security, privacy, and international streaming.

The best Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 cases Here are some of the best phone cases you can order for the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 to help protect your new phone.

The best Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 cases The best Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 cases come from Otterbox, Spigen, Samsung, and SUPCASE.

The 4 best TVs of 2025, tested by experts Our experts reviewed the best TVs from every major brand to recommend the top QLED and OLED models across performance levels.

The best LG TVs of 2025 We tested several LG TVs, including the highly rated C-and G-series OLEDs, to find the brand's best displays.

The best iPhone 16 Plus screen protectors in 2025 The best iPhone 16 Plus screen protectors defend against scratching and cracking without breaking the bank.

The best iPhone 16e screen protectors The best iPhone 16e screen protectors provide lasting defense and include an installation tool for straightforward application.

The best iPhone 16 Pro Max screen protectors in 2025 The best iPhone 16 Pro Max screen protectors are durable, tempered glass films with an installation kit or tool for easy application.

The best iPhone 16 Pro screen protectors in 2025 The best iPhone 16 Pro screen protectors provide lasting protection against damage and include a kit or tool for effective and effortless application.

The best iPhone 16 screen protectors in 2025 The best iPhone 16 screen protectors are scratch-resistant and durable. Our picks include options from Zagg, Spigen, JETech, and Otterbox.

The best wireless earbuds for clear sound and a comfortable fit The best wireless earbuds offer great audio quality in a compact design. These are our top picks from Sony, Apple, Bose, Technics, Anker, and JLab.

The best Sony headphones of 2025 The best Sony headphones deliver great sound quality and excellent noise cancellation. After hands-on testing, here are our top recommendations.
